items.stem: What three things does a fire need to burn?
items.rationale: This is known as the Fire Triangle.

items.stem: Which extinguisher should you use on a deep fat fryer fire?
items.rationale: Wet Chemical extinguishers are specifically designed for Class F (cooking oil) fires. Water causes an explosion.

items.stem: What should you do if you hear the fire alarm?
options: Evacuate immediately to the assembly point
items.rationale: Immediate evacuation saves lives. Do not delay.
